name: Trash Troll
description:
Collect trash using your river magnets to create large trash piles. Use those piles to make bridges connecting each of the platforms in the river. Connect all of the platforms to help your forest friends cross the river safely!

Switch Active Magnet: Left Click / Right Click

Move Magnet: A / D

Rotate Magnet: W / S

Explode Trash on Magnet: R

Pause Game: ESC
